text:
TIRUNELVELI

Department of Arabic and Islamic Studies - Sadakkathullah Appa College: Quiz competition on Islam, T.E.S. Fathu Rabbani, correspondent, SAC, presides, 11 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, V.K. Nursery and Primary School, Tirunelveli Town, 7 p.m.

SANKAR NAGAR

Sankar HSS: District-level inter-school science exhibition, S. Shanmugam, Senior Vice-President (Production), The India Cements Limited, inaugurates, 10 a.m. P. Udhayakumar, Additional Superintendent of Police, distributes prizes, 3 p.m.

SHENCOTTAI

Vaanchi Movement: Felicitation to Japan railways for operating a train for just one student, Vaanchinathan Government Middle School, 10.35 a.m.

VALLIYOOR

Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering – PET Engineering College: Motivation programme for civil service aspirants, K. Allaudin, formerly IAS office officer, speaks, 10 a.m.

Thoothukudi

Don Bosco College of Arts and Science, Keela Eral: Department of Commerce, seminar on ‘Recent trends in e-marketing,’ 10 a.m.
title: Engagements
